name: Pasta
recipe: Boil pasta. Make sauce with tomato and cheese. Mix and serve.

name: Omelette
recipe: Beat eggs. Fry with onion and salt. Serve hot.

name: Salad
recipe: Chop all vegetables. Mix and drizzle lemon juice. Serve fresh.

name: Fried Rice
recipe: Cook rice. Stir-fry vegetables and egg. Mix with rice and soy sauce.

name: Grilled Cheese
recipe: Butter bread. Place cheese between slices. Grill until golden.

name: Pancakes
recipe: Mix flour, milk, egg, and sugar. Cook on pan with butter. Serve warm.

name: Tomato Soup
recipe: Cook tomatoes, onion, and garlic. Blend and boil with water and salt.

name: Chocolate Cake
recipe: Mix all ingredients. Bake at 180Â°C for 25-30 minutes.

name: Chicken Curry
recipe: Fry onion and spices. Add chicken and tomato. Cook until tender.

name: Fruit Smoothie
recipe: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.
